title: [Medicine] Anifrolumab shows long-term promise in patients with lupus: Treatment with anifrolumab was well tolerated and had an acceptable long-term safety profile, while sustaining reduction in lupus disease activity and reducing or eliminating the need for steroid medications
[Health] Gender-Affirming Chest Reconstruction Among Transgender and Gender-Diverse Adolescents in the US From 2016 to 2019 | Adolescent Medicine | JAMA Pediatrics | JAMA Network
